sources.title: Take A Chance
sources.description: Archie Burton is a horse trainer who has entered one of his horses, Take A Chance, into the Gold Cup. But his wife is irritated by his mood towards her so she becomes friendly with another man, whose real objective is to learn the secrets of her husbands stables.

metadata.Plot: Archie Burton is a horse trainer who has entered one of his horses, Take A Chance, into the Gold Cup. But his wife is irritated by his mood towards her so becomes friendly with another man whose real objective is to learn the secrets of her husbands stables.
metadata.Writer: Walter C. Hackett, G.H. Moresby-White, D.B. Wyndham-Lewis
metadata.Actors: Claude Hulbert, Binnie Hale, Henry Kendall
